Description_lang: Reduces the cost of your Shield Block ability by ${$m1/-10} Rage and increases the damage absorbed by your Shield Barrier by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: Reduces the cost of your Shield Block ability by 5 Rage and increases the damage absorbed by your Shield Barrier by 5%.
description_blz.es_MX: Reduce 5 p. el coste de ira de tu facultad Bloquear con escudo y aumenta el daño que absorbe tu Barrera de escudos un 5%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz em 5 o custo de Raiva da sua habilidade Levantar Escudo e aumenta em 5% o dano absorvido por sua Barreira de Escudos.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert die Kosten Eurer Fähigkeit 'Schildblock' um 5 Wut und erhöht die Schadensabsorption Eurer Fähigkeit 'Schildbarriere' um 5%.
description_blz.en_GB: Reduces the cost of your Shield Block ability by 5 Rage and increases the damage absorbed by your Shield Barrier by 5%.
description_blz.es_ES: Reduce 5 p. el coste de ira de tu facultad Bloquear con escudo y aumenta el daño que absorbe tu Barrera de escudos un 5%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit le coût de votre technique Maîtrise du blocage de 5 points de rage et augmente les dégâts absorbés par votre Barrière protectrice de 5%.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il costo in rabbia di Scudo Saldo di 5 e aumenta i danni assorbiti da Scudo Rabbioso del 5%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Снижает затраты ярости на применение способности "Блок щитом" на 5 ед. и увеличивает количество урона, поглощаемое "Непроницаемым щитом", на 5%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 방패 올리기의 분노 소모량이 5만큼 감소하고, 수호 방패로 흡수하는 피해가 5%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你盾牌格擋技能的消耗減少5點怒氣，盾牌屏障吸收的傷害值提高5%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的盾牌格挡消耗的怒气值降低5点，并且使你的盾牌屏障吸收的伤害量提高5%。
